about_the_game:
Ascend from the Depths in a Challenging Underground Adventure!

Take on the role of a determined mole on an epic journey from the deepest underground tunnels to the sunlit surface. Without arms to climb, you'll rely on a unique ability to phase through walls and obstacles. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate treacherous terrains where every misstep could send you plummeting back down.

Overview

This is a demanding platformer that tests your skill, patience, and determination. With minimalist controls and mechanics that are easy to learn but hard to master, each achievement feels immensely rewarding. Immerse yourself in atmospheric subterranean environments filled with hidden secrets and subtle storytelling.

Key Features

  • Unique Phasing Mechanics Master the art of passing through obstacles using precise timing and strategy.

  • Challenging Gameplay Prepare for a true test of perseverance where every fall is a lesson learned.

  • Atmospheric Environments Explore beautifully crafted underground landscapes rich with details.

  • Progressive Difficulty Encounter increasingly complex obstacles as you ascend toward the surface.

name: Climb Don't Dig

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Guide a mole without arms on a challenging ascent from underground to the surface, phasing through obstacles in this demanding platformer.
